files.patch:
@@ -441,0 +441,2 @@
+     * To obtain a {@code Class} object for a named primitive type, use
+     * {@link #forPrimitiveName(String)}.
@@ -634,0 +636,2 @@
+     * If the argument is not the name of a primitive type, {@code
+     * null} is returned.
@@ -638,2 +642,0 @@
-     * @throws ClassNotFoundException is the argument name is not
-     * the name of a primitive type (or {@code void})
@@ -645,2 +647,1 @@
-    public static Class<?> forPrimitiveName(String primitiveName)
-        throws ClassNotFoundException {
+    public static Class<?> forPrimitiveName(String primitiveName) {
@@ -663,2 +664,1 @@
-        default -> throw new ClassNotFoundException(primitiveName +
-                                                    " is not a primitive type");
+        default        -> null;
